Recept: skutno-sadna pita
Za novembrske dni.
03 Nov 2019, 10:39 by R. O.
Testo:400 g moke200 g masla (sobna temperatura)100 g sladkorja3 jajca1 dcl kisle smetanenaribana lupina pol eko limoneprašek za pecivo (vinski kamen)Skutni nadev:0,5 kg skute3 dl kisle smetane​jajce100 g sladkorjavaniljev stroksok ene limoneSadni nadev:450 g gozdnih sadežev (višenj, malin ali ribeza)2 žlici sladkorja1. Za testo penasto umešamo maslo in sladkor, dodamo jajca in dobro premešamo. Dodamo limonovo lupinico, kislo smetano in na to presejemo moko s praškom za pecivo. Zmešamo s kuhalnico, potem zvrnemo na delovno površino in mesimo z rokami. Testo mora biti mehko, a se ne sme lepiti na roke. Če se, dodamo malo moke (po žlicah). Razdelimo ga na dva enaka dela in pustimo počivati kake pol ure.2. Medtem v kozici pokuhamo sadje in ga spasiramo do gladkega. Zmes mora biti gostljata. Ohladimo.3. Skuto zmiksamo z jajci, dodamo sladkor in kislo smetano ter limonov sok.4. Pečico segrejemo na 180 stopinj. Eno polovico testa razvaljamo in ga damo na pekač, lahko tistega od pečice, ki smo ga namastili in obložili s papirjem za peko. Testo premažemo s sadnim nadevom, čez naložimo skuto in lepo zgladimo. V velikosti pekača razvaljamo še drugi del testa in ga položimo na nadev ter nekajkrat prebodemo z vilicami. Ali pa iz testa izrežemo trakove in sestavimo mrežo ali izrežemo srčke z modelčki za piškote ter jih zlagamo po vrhu. Pečemo 45 minut. Pita naj se popolnoma ohladi, potem jo posladkamo s sladkorjem v prahu. Postrežemo s sadjem.

Recipe: cottage cheese-fruit pie
For November days.
03 Nov 2019, 10:39 by R.O.
Dough: 400 g flour200 g butter (room temperature) 100 g sugar3 eggs1 dcl sour cream-chopped peel half eco lemon-cake (cottage cheese) Cottage cheese stuffing: 0,5 kg cottage cheese3 dl sour cream egg100 g sugar-strokes one lemonFruit stuffing: 450 forest fruits (cherries, raspberries or currants) 2 tablespoons of sugar1. For the dough, foam the butter and sugar, add the eggs and mix well. Add lemon zest, sour cream and sift flour with baking powder. Mix with the kettle, then roll over to the work surface and knead with your hands. The dough should be soft but not sticky to the hands. If it is, add some flour (tablespoons). Divide it into two equal parts and let rest for half an hour.2. Meanwhile, in the shrimp, we cook the fruit and save it until smooth. The mixture must be dense. Cool.3. Mix the curd with eggs, add sugar and sour cream and lemon juice.4. Preheat the oven to 180 degrees. Roll out one half of the dough and place it on a baking tray, one that can be greased and baked with baking paper. Coat the dough with fruit filling, put the curd over and smooth. In the baking size, roll out the second part of the dough and place it on the stuffing and pierce it several times with a fork. Or we cut the strips out of the dough and put together a net or cut the hearts out with cookie cutters and stack them over the top. Bake for 45 minutes. Let the pies cool completely, then sweeten with powdered sugar. We serve fruit.
